fgeo.abundance: Calculate abundance and basal area

fgeo.abundance calculates abundance, basal area and diversity.

Installation

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github(repo = "forestgeo/fgeo.abundance")

For details on how to install packages from GitHub, see this article.

Example

Abundance and basal area.

library(fgeo.abundance)

stem <- data.frame(
  quadrat = paste0(0, 1:3),
  sp = letters[1:3],
  status = c("A", "A", "D"),
  dbh = 1:3,
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

abundance(stem)
#>   quadrat sp n
#> 1      01  a 1
#> 2      02  b 1

basal_area(stem)
#> Units of returned values are the square of the input units.
#>   quadrat sp basal_area
#> 1      01  a  0.7853982
#> 2      02  b  3.1415927

smry_diversity(abundance(stem), n)
#>    diversity     value
#> 1    shannon 0.6931472
#> 2 invsimpson 2.0000000
#> 3    simpson 0.5000000
